summary: Senior estimator with 15+ years in diverse sectors like infrastructure and residential, achieving ~$120M in project budgets managed.

bullets.text: Analyzed tender documents and conducted First Principle estimating for large-scale civil projects, ensuring precise cost projections and competitive bidding.
Prepared detailed Bills of Quantities (BOQ) and tendering documents for comprehensive civil and architectural projects, covering aspects from foundations to interior design.
Executed quantity take-off processes for various construction elements, facilitating precise cost estimation and material allocation.
Managed cost estimation and consulting for major projects, including procurement of quotes for MEP installations.
Supervised the preparation of final detailed BOQs and final accounts, contributing to successful project closures.
Led residential project documentations for approval and regularization, streamlining regulatory compliance.
Took charge of the Fortaleza Brazil Temple Complex, conducting detailed quantity take-offs for complex architectural designs.
Oversaw tender analysis for infrastructure projects, establishing accurate preliminary budgets for Tender Opening Committee (TOC) reviews.
Constructed comprehensive Bill of Quantities (BOQ), covering materials, labour, and technical plant requirements for major infrastructure contracts.
Engaged in stringent cost estimation and consulting, establishing strong negotiations with suppliers to optimise project budgets.
Crafted submission documents inclusive of assumptions, exclusions, and pricing schedules, securing competitive project bids.
Directed the analysis of civil and engineering drawings to ascertain cost implications and propose budgetary enhancements.
Managed the quantity take-off processes for infrastructure projects such as South Morang Terminal Station, interfacing with contractors to ensure clarity in scope.
Achieved strategic shifts in construction methods, allowing projects to adhere strictly to financial guidelines.
Facilitated scope analysis and quantity take-off for a portfolio surpassing 100,000 m² of commercial building projects.
Executed cost estimations and detailed BOQs, playing a pivotal role in project budgeting and final account settlements.
Enabled effective cost consulting, ensuring comprehensive cost reviews with suppliers and contractual partners.
Directed meetings with site and management teams for project explanations, establishing open communication for seamless project execution.
Implemented strategic solutions for dispute resolutions, showcasing adaptability and technical problem-solving in challenging scenarios.
Led feasibility studies and cost analysis for high-rise residential buildings, advancing investment viability assessments.
Prepared final Bill of Quantities (BOQ) for Poema Castro Alves Residencial, streamlining costing for projects exceeding 15,000 m².
Coordinated cost comparisons for design stages, ensuring optimal budgeting and project fidelity.
Engineered feasibility cost studies for logistic warehouses, contributing to strategic budget planning.
Formulated comprehensive budgeting strategies, synchronizing construction schedules with financial programs.
Handled material and cost estimations for IGESP Hospital, overseeing a major expansion worth $9.6M.
Conducted thorough analysis and documentation for Shopping Metrópole, balancing cost adjustments for a 22,000 m² project.
Implemented project compatibility reviews, facilitating design adjustments and variance reconciliations.

education.additionalInfo: CAU BR, AIQS Member as of Dec 2023

additionalExperience: Specialized in construction management via Columbia University courses, skilled in Autodesk software suite with a focus on improving design accuracy and project efficiency.
